# About this template

This template shows the use of the typography parameters `fontsize`, `heading-fontsize`, `title-fontsize` `heading-fontfill`, `title-fontfill`, and `page-number-align` parameters. The fonts are also customized using `mainfont`, `monofont`, and `title-font`. A basic custom footer is also shown with this template.

## Examples
